did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY

did.abstract: Transcription of a church roll which includes in alphabetical order names with biographical data such as birth/death dates and lineage.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Transcription of a church roll which includes in alphabetical order names with biographical data such as birth/death dates and lineage.
